summary: This is an email chain from August 15, 2019, regarding the preparation of a weekly Epstein Significant Activity Report (SAR). It involves FBI personnel discussing victim outreach and services, including a meeting scheduled with an Epstein victim that afternoon.

persons.name: FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting information for the weekly Epstein Significant Activity Report (SAR).

events.title: Meeting with Epstein victim
events.description: An FBI representative mentions they are headed to meet with an Epstein victim in the afternoon.

locations: 290 (likely referring to 290 Broadway, NYC, a federal building housing FBI offices)
keyFacts: The FBI was compiling a weekly Significant Activity Report (SAR) on the Epstein case as of August 15, 2019.
The report required tracking the number of victims spoken to by the Victim Services Division (VSD) in NY, Miami, and elsewhere.
The report required details on services offered to victims, how many accepted services, and if services were being arranged for others.
An FBI representative was scheduled to meet with an Epstein victim on the afternoon of August 15, 2019.
